title: A Tale of two cities
brief_description: A pictorial record of the effects of the dropping of atomic bombs by the USA on the Japanese cities of Nagasaki and Hiroshima, in August 1945. Made for US Service personnel, featuring dramatic music and narration.
description: A pictorial record of the effects of the dropping of atomic bombs by the USA on the Japanese cities of Nagasaki and Hiroshima, in August 1945. Made for US Service personnel, featuring dramatic music and narration.
